media.headline: Cabrera's RBI double
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Carbrera doubles in Saladino for early lead
media.bigblurb: Melky Cabrera lines a double to the right-field wall, driving in Tyler Saladino to give the White Sox a 1-0 lead in the bottom of the 1st

media.headline: Jones' first career home run
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Jones belts first MLB homer on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: JaCoby Jones hammers his first career home run, a three-run shot to left field, giving the Tigers a 3-1 lead in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Castellanos' two-run homer
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Castellanos rips a two-run homer to right
media.bigblurb: Nicholas Castellanos crushes a two-run homer to right field, giving the White Sox a 5-1 lead in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Kinsler's solo home run
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Kinsler smacks a solo homer to pad the lead
media.bigblurb: Ian Kinsler belts a solo home run to left field, giving the Tigers a 6-1 lead in the top of the 4th inning

media.headline: Tigers honor Mike Ilitch
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Tigers wear patch to honor Mike Ilitch
media.bigblurb: The Tigers honor their late owner, Mike Ilitch, by wearing a Mr. I patch on their uniforms

media.headline: Upton leaves game with injury
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Collins pinch hits for Upton after injury
media.bigblurb: Tyler Collins pinch-hits for Justin Upton in the top of the 7th after being forced from the game with a knee contusion

media.headline: Jacob May's mom on his debut
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Jacob May's mom on her son's MLB debut
media.bigblurb: White Sox rookie outfielder Jacob May's mom talks about his first career game and what it means to him and their family

media.headline: Ynoa nabs Kinsler after review
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Kinsler ruled out at second after review
media.bigblurb: Ian Kinsler is ruled safe on a pickoff attempt in the 9th inning, but after the White Sox challenge, Kinsler is ruled out at second base

media.headline: May's RBI groundout
media.blurb: DET@CWS: May records first career RBI on groundout
media.bigblurb: Jacob May grounds out to second base, scoring Cody Asche from third base for his first career RBI in the bottom of the 9th inning

media.headline: Verlander strikes out Anderson
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Verlander fans Anderson for first K of 2017
media.bigblurb: Justin Verlander strikes out Tim Anderson swinging for his first strikeout of the 2017 season

media.headline: Quintana rings up McCann
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Quintana strikes out McCann for first K
media.bigblurb: Jose Quintana strikes out James McCann looking for his first strikeout of the 2017 season

media.headline: Abreu's RBI groundout
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Abreu plates Cabrera on groundout
media.bigblurb: Jose Abreu grounds out to shortstop, scoring Melky Cabrera from third base, to cut the White Sox deficit to 6-2 in the 4th inning

media.headline: Verlander's 10th strikeout
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Verlander strikes out Garcia for his 10th K
media.bigblurb: Justin Verlander gets his 10th strikeout of the game, becoming the second Tigers pitcher to do so on Opening Day since Mickey Lolich in 1970

media.headline: Tigers cut down Cabrera at third
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Tigers' solid relay denies Cabrera triple
media.bigblurb: Mikie Mahtook and Ian Kinsler team up to catch Melky Cabrera trying to stretch a double into a triple in the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: McCann's spectacular catch
media.blurb: DET@CWS: McCann makes a great catch over dugout
media.bigblurb: James McCann makes a spectacular catch over the dugout fence in the bottom of the 9th inning to end the game

media.headline: Quintana's first pitch of game
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Quintana throws first pitch of the game
media.bigblurb: Jose Quintana throws a strike for the first pitch of the game to start the White Sox season

media.headline: Jones steals first career base
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Jones swipes second base for first MLB steal
media.bigblurb: JaCoby Jones steals his first career base, making it to second base safely in the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Garcia's gender reveal surprise
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Garcia's pregnant wife gives gender surprise
media.bigblurb: Avisail Garcia gets a surprise from his wife and daughter on Opening Day, revealing the gender of their next child

media.headline: Verlander's 10 K's in 10 seconds
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Verlander's 10 strikeouts in 10 seconds
media.bigblurb: Watch all 10 of Justin Verlander's strikeouts vs. the White Sox in 10 seconds

media.headline: Recap: DET 6, CWS 3
media.blurb: 4/4/17: Verlander leads Tigers to Opening Day win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: JaCoby Jones hit his first career home run, while Justin Verlander struck out ten to defeat the White Sox, 6-3, on Opening Day

media.headline: Renteria on Opening Day loss
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Renteria on Quintana's outing in tough loss
media.bigblurb: White Sox manager Rick Renteria speaks about Jose Quintana's rocky start and rebound to keep the team in the game during its 6-3 loss

media.headline: Ausmus on Opening Day victory
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Ausmus on Verlander, Opening Day victory
media.bigblurb: Tigers manager Brad Ausmus discusses Justin Verlander's strong outing, JaCoby Jones' home run and getting off to a strong start

media.headline: Verlander strikes out 10
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Verlander fans 10 in his Opening Day start
media.bigblurb: Justin Verlander notches the win and becomes the first Tigers pitcher with at least 10 K's on Opening Day since Mickey Lolich in 1970

media.headline: Verlander on Opening Day win
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Verlander discusses stellar outing
media.bigblurb: Tigers ace Justin Verlander reflects on his ninth Opening Day start, a 10-strikeout performance to beat the White Sox

media.headline: Jones on first home run
media.blurb: DET@CWS: Jones on hitting first Major League homer
media.bigblurb: Tigers rookie JaCoby Jones talks about hitting his first Major League homer in the Tigers' Opening Day win over the White Sox

media.headline: 4/4/17 CG: DET@CWS
media.blurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: DET@CWS
media.bigblurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: DET@CWS
